name: Action Adventure Prototype (Pascal Lambert)
description:
This is a prototype of an Action/Adventure game made for class. My third project using Unity.

A controller will be needed to play the game. Please read the Readme file included with the project. Alt-F4 to exit.

Made by:

  • Aaron Scott - Music
  • Aaron Schmit - @theaaronschmit - Art
  • Liam Allen-Miller @RSSLiam - Game Design/Level Design
  • Pascal Lambert - @pascall2 - Scripting
  • “Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“
